suggest.joomla/archive: To use the ExportCommand class, install joomla/archive
suggest.joomla/console: To use the ExportCommand and ImportCommand classes, install joomla/console
suggest.joomla/di: To use the Database ServiceProviderInterface objects, install joomla/di.
suggest.joomla/filesystem: To use the ExportCommand and ImportCommand classes, install joomla/filesystem
suggest.joomla/registry: To use the Database ServiceProviderInterface objects, install joomla/registry.
suggest.psr/log: To use the LoggingMonitor, install psr/log.
suggest.ext-mysqli: To connect to a MySQL database via MySQLi
suggest.ext-pdo: To connect to a MySQL, PostgreSQL, or SQLite database via PDO
suggest.ext-sqlsrv: To connect to a SQL Server database

scripts-descriptions.testdox: Run the PHPUnit tests and output the result in testdox format
scripts-descriptions.coverage: Run the PHPUnit tests and write an HTML coverage report to build/coverage
scripts-descriptions.sign: Compile .drone.jsonnet and sign the resulting YML file. Make sure to have set DRONE_SERVER and DRONE_TOKEN properly.
scripts-descriptions.style: Fix any style issues that can be fixed automatically and run a check afterwards to list issues that could not be solved.
